channel.title: 调试 on 珍珑阁
channel.description: Recent content in 调试 on 珍珑阁

item.title: WSL 常用命令
item.description: # 安装 dism.exe /online /enable-feature /featurename:Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux /all /norestart dism.exe /online /enable-feature /featurename:VirtualMachinePlatform /all /norestart Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux wsl --set-default-version 2 # 查看实例 wsl -l -v LxRunOffline l # 查看实例IP wsl hostname -I # 安装Ubuntu-16.04.2 LxRunOffline i -n Ubuntu-16.04.2 -d f:\wsl\Ubuntu-16.04.2 -f "F:\wsl\16.04.2-server-cloudimg-amd64-root.tar.gz" -s wsl --set-version

item.title: Wireshark查看网络通讯数据包
item.description: 过滤条件窗口输入 目标主机的IP和Port组合条件即可,如下 (ip.dst == 127.0.0.1 and tcp.dstport == 9090) or (ip.src == 127.0.0.1 and tcp.srcport == 9090) 关于localhost通讯抓包 要求卸载winpcap
